meanings.sent1: I pedaled on the exercycle at the gym.
meanings.sent2: The exercycle in the corner of the room looked brand new.
meanings.sent3: When the exercycle started beeping, I realized I forgot to adjust the settings.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to reach her fitness goals was like riding an endless exercycle.
meanings.sent5: The exercycle hummed softly as I increased the resistance.

meanings.definition: To use a stationary exercise bicycle for physical fitness.
meanings.sent1: I like to exercycle for thirty minutes every morning.
meanings.sent2: She exercycles regularly to stay in shape.
meanings.sent3: Exercycling while watching TV makes the time fly by.
meanings.sent4: Exercycling uphill can really challenge your leg muscles.
meanings.sent5: He decided to exercycle instead of going for a run in the rain.
